name: Wedding Planner Ltd
overview:
WeddingPlanner.co.uk provides brides and grooms with wedding planning tools to help them plan their big day.

Brides (or grooms) create an account including the day of their wedding, and their postcode to gain access to a range of tools to help with planning including budget, guest list invitation, local supplier directory, menu choices, table plans and more.

The site is full of advice, suggestions, tips and recommendations on how to plan the most exciting day of the brides life.

The site also provides a supplier directory of over 30,000 business in the UK from florists to photographers, venue hire to cake decorators. The directory is the most comprehensive wedding directory in the UK.

Each week, all registered members receive an update on whats outstanding on their ‘to-do’ list ensuring they stay ahead of where they need to be and don’t become overwhelmed by the planning.
